general_advisory: The light rainfall would not be enough for the seed bed preparation and subsequent transplanting, so preserve the rain water accordingly.

advisory: Take small to medium duration varieties, so that water scarcity at the later stage can be avoided.
Rice nursery beds should be prepared for seeding preparation in rice.
Before nursery sowing, treat the seeds with Carbendazim or Mancozeb @2gram/kg of seed.
For storage of mango, use rigid containers that can withstand stacking without getting deformed.
For increasing the shelf life, fruits are stored at low temperature and high humidity.
Pre cool the fruits to required temperature before storing at low temperature.
Apply 12.5 t/ha of FYM or compost during last ploughing.
After sowing is complete, cover the field with dry leaves and to protect the leaves from wind gust, put small dried shoot over it.
The mulching will help in moisture conservation and decrease the weed intensity.
Rainwater is acidic and can wash out alkaline materials from the edges of the pond and reduce pH of water in the pond.
To limit this, use lime along edges of the pond before it rains (apply it dryly) with 10 kg lime/100m2.
After the rain, use lime with 10-20 kg lime/ha.
